channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: “Automating Export of Microsoft Sentinel Analytic Rules mapped to MITRE Tactics & Techniques”
item.description: 1. Introduction In modern Security Operations Centers (SOCs), mapping detections to the MITRE ATT&CK framework is critical. MITRE ATT&CK provides a structured, globally recognized model of adversary behavior, categorized into Tactics (goals) and Techniques (methods). Microsoft Sentinel analytic rules frequently include MITRE mappings, but viewing or exporting these at scale isn’t straightforward within the portal. Security teams often need: • A centralized view of existing detections mapped to MITRE ATT&CK • A CSV export for reporting, audits, and threat coverage assessments • Insights for S...
